name: Infinite Impermanence
lore: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; negate its effects (until the end of this turn), then, if this card was Set before activation and is on the field at resolution, for the rest of the turn all other Spell/Trap effects in this column are negated. If you control no cards, you can activate this card from your hand.

name: Evenly Matched
lore: At the end of the Battle Phase, if your opponent controls more cards than you do: You can make your opponent banish cards from their face-down so they control the same number of cards as you do. If you control no cards, you can activate this card from your hand.

name: Max Metalmorph
lore: Tribute 1 face-up monster; Special Summon 1 monster that cannot be Normal Summoned/Set and mentions "Max Metalmorph" from your hand, Deck, or GY, then you can equip this card to it with the following effect, â€¢ The eqquipped monster gains 400 ATK/DEF, it cannot be destroyed by Spell or monster effects, also your opponent cannot target it with monster effects or Spell Cards or effects. You can only activate 1 "Max Metalmorph" per turn.
